query: SELECT boardcommissionname, membername, filingtype, date_trunc_ym(recusaldate) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE recusaldate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY boardcommissionname, membername, filingtype, month ORDER BY month, boardcommissionname, membername

membername.description: Name of member of the board or commission

filingtype.description: Is the Filing Original or Amendment?

table_metadata.title: SFEC Form 3209b - Notification of Recusal Filings
table_metadata.description: Notification of recusal filings by members of city boards or commissions excluding members of the Board of Supervisors.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Government officials, policymakers, researchers, and the general public interested in governance and ethical compliance

whom_it_may_interest: Policymakers, researchers, and citizens interested in board or commission ethics and transparency
